entries.journal_entry_description: You found a piece of an old starmap. Nym seems to be interested in getting the completed map.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Travel to Mos Eisley on Tatooine and find the smuggler Han Solo. Try to find a way to get the starmap piece from him.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Solo wants 50.000 credits for the map piece. You should go back to Nym and let him know.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You have the 50.000 credits that Solo wants for the map piece. Make sure that Solo is giving you the real piece before handing him the money.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You have bought the last map piece from Solo. Return to Nym and reap your rewards.
